name: Tactical Crisis
description:
Tactical Crisis An 8-bit styled Turn-based-Tactics game with an action twist.

Made for Danny Arnold as part of Secret Santa Jam 2020, Tactical Crisis is a short, tongue in cheek 10 minute experience mostly for the giggles.

Made in Unity with some design help from Chloe Goodchild and Kal Holmes who tested it.
